name: The Knight Only Lives Today
author: SOULPUNG &#40μ†μΈν’&#41
content: Is dying repeatedly a blessing? Enkrid&#039s life-long dream of becoming a knight looked to be forever out of reach, until one day he died... and woke up at the beginning of that same day! Now that he has unlimited chances to train and engage in mortal combat, just how far can he go?
